text: 43 INTENTION LOCKS An intention lock allows a higher level node to be locked in shared or exclusive mode without having to check all descendent nodes. If a node is in an intention mode, then explicit locking is being done at a lower level in the tree. .T< .‘}N >l -49 1:03:29 /1:18:13 » Deadlock Prevention > [cc) * El | E] CMU Database Systems - 17 Two-Phase Locking Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
